:::config { "language": "files", "theme": "github-light" }
// torchlight! { "lineNumbers": false, "fileStyle": "html" }
resources/
    name with space/
    # Full line comment
    blueprints/ # Partial comment
        collections/
            blog/
                post.yaml       # Old name [tl! --]
                basic_post.yaml # New name [tl! ++]
                art_directed_post.yaml
        taxonomies/
            tags/
                tag.yaml
        globals/
            global.yaml
            company.yaml
        assets/
            main.yaml
        forms/
            contact.yaml
        user.yaml
:::style
<style>

    /** Name of the file or folder **/
    .tl-files-name {
        position: relative;
        padding-left: 1.5em;
    }

    /** Icon for the file or folder, if you want one **/
    .tl-files-name::before {
        content: "";
        position: absolute;
        top: 0;
        left: 0;
        height: 100%;
        width: 1.25em;
        background-size: contain;
        background-repeat: no-repeat;
        background-position: 50% 50%;
    }


    /** Folder icon **/
    .tl-files-folder::before {
        background-image: url("data:image/svg+xml;base64,");
    }

    /** File icon **/
    .tl-files-file::before {
        background-image: url("data:image/svg+xml;base64,");

    }

    /** Connector lines **/
    .tl-connect-wrap {
        position: relative;
        display: inline-block;
        user-select: none;
    }

    /** Used to adjust lines to line up under your preferred icon **/
    .tl-connect-x-adjust {
        margin-left: 3px;
    }

    /** Pseudo elements whose borders are the connector lines **/
    .tl-connect::before, .tl-connect::after {
       position: absolute;
       display: inline-block;
       content: ' ';
       border-style: solid;
       border-color: #b0b5b6;
       border-width: 0px;
       width: 50%;
       height: 50%;
    }

    .tl-connect-h::before, .tl-connect-h::after {
       top: 50%;
    }

    .tl-connect-v::before, .tl-connect-v::after {
       left: 50%;
    }

    .tl-connect-left::before {
        left: 0;
        border-top-width: 1px;
    }

    .tl-connect-right::after {
        left: 50%;
        border-top-width: 1px;
    }

    .tl-connect-up::before {
        top: 0;
        border-left-width: 1px;
    }

    .tl-connect-down::after {
        top: 50%;
        border-left-width: 1px;
    }

    code .line {
        padding: 0px 20px;
        line-height: 1.6rem;
    }
</style>
:::expectation

</span></div><div class='line'><span style="color: #1b1f234d; text-align: right; -webkit-user-select: none; user-select: none;" class="line-number"> </span><span class="token" style="color: #6a737d;"><span class='tl-connect-wrap tl-connect-x-adjust'> <span class='tl-connect tl-connect-h'></span><span class='tl-connect tl-connect-v'></span></span><span class='tl-connect-wrap tl-connect-empty'><span class='tl-connect tl-connect-h'></span><span class='tl-connect tl-connect-v'></span></span><span class='tl-connect-wrap tl-connect-empty'><span class='tl-connect tl-connect-h'></span><span class='tl-connect tl-connect-v'></span></span><span class='tl-connect-wrap tl-connect-x-adjust'> <span class='tl-connect tl-connect-h'></span><span class='tl-connect tl-connect-v tl-connect-down tl-connect-up'></span></span><span class='tl-connect-wrap tl-connect-empty'><span class='tl-connect tl-connect-h'></span><span class='tl-connect tl-connect-v'></span></span><span class='tl-connect-wrap tl-connect-empty'><span class='tl-connect tl-connect-h'></span><span class='tl-connect tl-connect-v'></span></span><span class='tl-connect-wrap tl-connect-x-adjust'> <span class='tl-connect tl-connect-h tl-connect-right'></span><span class='tl-connect tl-connect-v tl-connect-down tl-connect-up'></span></span><span class='tl-connect-wrap'> <span class='tl-connect tl-connect-h tl-connect-left tl-connect-right'></span><span class='tl-connect tl-connect-v'></span></span><span class='tl-connect-wrap tl-connect-empty'><span class='tl-connect tl-connect-h'></span><span class='tl-connect tl-connect-v'></span></span></span><span class="token tl-files-file tl-files-name" style="color: #032f62;" tl-file-extension='yaml'>global.yaml</span><span class="token">
</span></div><div class='line'><span style="color: #1b1f234d; text-align: right; -webkit-user-select: none; user-select: none;" class="line-number"> </span><span class="token" style="color: #6a737d;"><span class='tl-connect-wrap tl-connect-x-adjust'> <span class='tl-connect tl-connect-h'></span><span class='tl-connect tl-connect-v'></span></span><span class='tl-connect-wrap tl-connect-empty'><span class='tl-connect tl-connect-h'></span><span class='tl-connect tl-connect-v'></span></span><span class='tl-connect-wrap tl-connect-empty'><span class='tl-connect tl-connect-h'></span><span class='tl-connect tl-connect-v'></span></span><span class='tl-connect-wrap tl-connect-x-adjust'> <span class='tl-connect tl-connect-h'></span><span class='tl-connect tl-connect-v tl-connect-down tl-connect-up'></span></span><span class='tl-connect-wrap tl-connect-empty'><span class='tl-connect tl-connect-h'></span><span class='tl-connect tl-connect-v'></span></span><span class='tl-connect-wrap tl-connect-empty'><span class='tl-connect tl-connect-h'></span><span class='tl-connect tl-connect-v'></span></span><span class='tl-connect-wrap tl-connect-x-adjust'> <span class='tl-connect tl-connect-h tl-connect-right'></span><span class='tl-connect tl-connect-v tl-connect-up'></span></span><span class='tl-connect-wrap'> <span class='tl-connect tl-connect-h tl-connect-left tl-connect-right'></span><span class='tl-connect tl-connect-v'></span></span><span class='tl-connect-wrap tl-connect-empty'><span class='tl-connect tl-connect-h'></span><span class='tl-connect tl-connect-v'></span></span></span><span class="token tl-files-file tl-files-name" style="color: #032f62;" tl-file-extension='yaml'>company.yaml</span><span class="token">
</span></div><div class='line'><span style="color: #1b1f234d; text-align: right; -webkit-user-select: none; user-select: none;" class="line-number"> </span><span class="token" style="color: #6a737d;"><span class='tl-connect-wrap tl-connect-x-adjust'> <span class='tl-connect tl-connect-h'></span><span class='tl-connect tl-connect-v'></span></span><span class='tl-connect-wrap tl-connect-empty'><span class='tl-connect tl-connect-h'></span><span class='tl-connect tl-connect-v'></span></span><span class='tl-connect-wrap tl-connect-empty'><span class='tl-connect tl-connect-h'></span><span class='tl-connect tl-connect-v'></span></span><span class='tl-connect-wrap tl-connect-x-adjust'> <span class='tl-connect tl-connect-h tl-connect-right'></span><span class='tl-connect tl-connect-v tl-connect-down tl-connect-up'></span></span><span class='tl-connect-wrap'> <span class='tl-connect tl-connect-h tl-connect-left tl-connect-right'></span><span class='tl-connect tl-connect-v'></span></span><span class='tl-connect-wrap tl-connect-empty'><span class='tl-connect tl-connect-h'></span><span class='tl-connect tl-connect-v'></span></span></span><span class="token tl-files-folder tl-files-name" style="color: #032f62;">assets/</span><span class="token">
</span></div><div class='line'><span style="color: #1b1f234d; text-align: right; -webkit-user-select: none; user-select: none;" class="line-number"> </span><span class="token" style="color: #6a737d;"><span class='tl-connect-wrap tl-connect-x-adjust'> <span class='tl-connect tl-connect-h'></span><span class='tl-connect tl-connect-v'></span></span><span class='tl-connect-wrap tl-connect-empty'><span class='tl-connect tl-connect-h'></span><span class='tl-connect tl-connect-v'></span></span><span class='tl-connect-wrap tl-connect-empty'><span class='tl-connect tl-connect-h'></span><span class='tl-connect tl-connect-v'></span></span><span class='tl-connect-wrap tl-connect-x-adjust'> <span class='tl-connect tl-connect-h'></span><span class='tl-connect tl-connect-v tl-connect-down tl-connect-up'></span></span><span class='tl-connect-wrap tl-connect-empty'><span class='tl-connect tl-connect-h'></span><span class='tl-connect tl-connect-v'></span></span><span class='tl-connect-wrap tl-connect-empty'><span class='tl-connect tl-connect-h'></span><span class='tl-connect tl-connect-v'></span></span><span class='tl-connect-wrap tl-connect-x-adjust'> <span class='tl-connect tl-connect-h tl-connect-right'></span><span class='tl-connect tl-connect-v tl-connect-up'></span></span><span class='tl-connect-wrap'> <span class='tl-connect tl-connect-h tl-connect-left tl-connect-right'></span><span class='tl-connect tl-connect-v'></span></span><span class='tl-connect-wrap tl-connect-empty'><span class='tl-connect tl-connect-h'></span><span class='tl-connect tl-connect-v'></span></span></span><span class="token tl-files-file tl-files-name" style="color: #032f62;" tl-file-extension='yaml'>main.yaml</span><span class="token">
</span></div><div class='line'><span style="color: #1b1f234d; text-align: right; -webkit-user-select: none; user-select: none;" class="line-number"> </span><span class="token" style="color: #6a737d;"><span class='tl-connect-wrap tl-connect-x-adjust'> <span class='tl-connect tl-connect-h'></span><span class='tl-connect tl-connect-v'></span></span><span class='tl-connect-wrap tl-connect-empty'><span class='tl-connect tl-connect-h'></span><span class='tl-connect tl-connect-v'></span></span><span class='tl-connect-wrap tl-connect-empty'><span class='tl-connect tl-connect-h'></span><span class='tl-connect tl-connect-v'></span></span><span class='tl-connect-wrap tl-connect-x-adjust'> <span class='tl-connect tl-connect-h tl-connect-right'></span><span class='tl-connect tl-connect-v tl-connect-down tl-connect-up'></span></span><span class='tl-connect-wrap'> <span class='tl-connect tl-connect-h tl-connect-left tl-connect-right'></span><span class='tl-connect tl-connect-v'></span></span><span class='tl-connect-wrap tl-connect-empty'><span class='tl-connect tl-connect-h'></span><span class='tl-connect tl-connect-v'></span></span></span><span class="token tl-files-folder tl-files-name" style="color: #032f62;">forms/</span><span class="token">
</span></div><div class='line'><span style="color: #1b1f234d; text-align: right; -webkit-user-select: none; user-select: none;" class="line-number"> </span><span class="token" style="color: #6a737d;"><span class='tl-connect-wrap tl-connect-x-adjust'> <span class='tl-connect tl-connect-h'></span><span class='tl-connect tl-connect-v'></span></span><span class='tl-connect-wrap tl-connect-empty'><span class='tl-connect tl-connect-h'></span><span class='tl-connect tl-connect-v'></span></span><span class='tl-connect-wrap tl-connect-empty'><span class='tl-connect tl-connect-h'></span><span class='tl-connect tl-connect-v'></span></span><span class='tl-connect-wrap tl-connect-x-adjust'> <span class='tl-connect tl-connect-h'></span><span class='tl-connect tl-connect-v tl-connect-down tl-connect-up'></span></span><span class='tl-connect-wrap tl-connect-empty'><span class='tl-connect tl-connect-h'></span><span class='tl-connect tl-connect-v'></span></span><span class='tl-connect-wrap tl-connect-empty'><span class='tl-connect tl-connect-h'></span><span class='tl-connect tl-connect-v'></span></span><span class='tl-connect-wrap tl-connect-x-adjust'> <span class='tl-connect tl-connect-h tl-connect-right'></span><span class='tl-connect tl-connect-v tl-connect-up'></span></span><span class='tl-connect-wrap'> <span class='tl-connect tl-connect-h tl-connect-left tl-connect-right'></span><span class='tl-connect tl-connect-v'></span></span><span class='tl-connect-wrap tl-connect-empty'><span class='tl-connect tl-connect-h'></span><span class='tl-connect tl-connect-v'></span></span></span><span class="token tl-files-file tl-files-name" style="color: #032f62;" tl-file-extension='yaml'>contact.yaml</span><span class="token">
</span></div><div class='line'><span style="color: #1b1f234d; text-align: right; -webkit-user-select: none; user-select: none;" class="line-number"> </span><span class="token" style="color: #6a737d;"><span class='tl-connect-wrap tl-connect-x-adjust'> <span class='tl-connect tl-connect-h'></span><span class='tl-connect tl-connect-v'></span></span><span class='tl-connect-wrap tl-connect-empty'><span class='tl-connect tl-connect-h'></span><span class='tl-connect tl-connect-v'></span></span><span class='tl-connect-wrap tl-connect-empty'><span class='tl-connect tl-connect-h'></span><span class='tl-connect tl-connect-v'></span></span><span class='tl-connect-wrap tl-connect-x-adjust'> <span class='tl-connect tl-connect-h tl-connect-right'></span><span class='tl-connect tl-connect-v tl-connect-up'></span></span><span class='tl-connect-wrap'> <span class='tl-connect tl-connect-h tl-connect-left tl-connect-right'></span><span class='tl-connect tl-connect-v'></span></span><span class='tl-connect-wrap tl-connect-empty'><span class='tl-connect tl-connect-h'></span><span class='tl-connect tl-connect-v'></span></span></span><span class="token tl-files-file tl-files-name" style="color: #032f62;" tl-file-extension='yaml'>user.yaml</span><span class="token">
</span></div></code></pre>
:::end

</span></div><div class='line'><span style="color: #1b1f234d; text-align: right; -webkit-user-select: none; user-select: none;" class="line-number">  </span><span class="token" style="color: #6a737d;"><span class='tl-connect-wrap tl-connect-x-adjust'> <span class='tl-connect tl-connect-h tl-connect-right'></span><span class='tl-connect tl-connect-v tl-connect-down tl-connect-up'></span></span><span class='tl-connect-wrap'> <span class='tl-connect tl-connect-h tl-connect-left tl-connect-right'></span><span class='tl-connect tl-connect-v'></span></span><span class='tl-connect-wrap tl-connect-empty'><span class='tl-connect tl-connect-h'></span><span class='tl-connect tl-connect-v'></span></span></span><span class="token tl-files-folder tl-files-name" style="color: #032f62;">name with space/</span><span class="token">
</span></div><div class='line'><span style="color: #1b1f234d; text-align: right; -webkit-user-select: none; user-select: none;" class="line-number">  </span><span class="token" style="color: #6a737d;"><span class='tl-connect-wrap tl-connect-x-adjust'> <span class='tl-connect tl-connect-h'></span><span class='tl-connect tl-connect-v tl-connect-down tl-connect-up'></span></span><span class='tl-connect-wrap tl-connect-empty'><span class='tl-connect tl-connect-h'></span><span class='tl-connect tl-connect-v'></span></span><span class='tl-connect-wrap tl-connect-empty'><span class='tl-connect tl-connect-h'></span><span class='tl-connect tl-connect-v'></span></span></span><span class="token" style="color: #6a737d;">#</span><span class="token" style="color: #6a737d;"> Full line comment
</span></div><div class='line'><span style="color: #1b1f234d; text-align: right; -webkit-user-select: none; user-select: none;" class="line-number">  </span><span class="token" style="color: #6a737d;"><span class='tl-connect-wrap tl-connect-x-adjust'> <span class='tl-connect tl-connect-h tl-connect-right'></span><span class='tl-connect tl-connect-v tl-connect-up'></span></span><span class='tl-connect-wrap'> <span class='tl-connect tl-connect-h tl-connect-left tl-connect-right'></span><span class='tl-connect tl-connect-v'></span></span><span class='tl-connect-wrap tl-connect-empty'><span class='tl-connect tl-connect-h'></span><span class='tl-connect tl-connect-v'></span></span></span><span class="token tl-files-folder tl-files-name" style="color: #032f62;">blueprints/</span><span class="token"> </span><span class="token" style="color: #6a737d;">#</span><span class="token" style="color: #6a737d;"> Partial comment
</span></div><div class='line'><span style="color: #1b1f234d; text-align: right; -webkit-user-select: none; user-select: none;" class="line-number">  </span><span class="token" style="color: #6a737d;"><span class='tl-connect-wrap tl-connect-x-adjust'> <span class='tl-connect tl-connect-h'></span><span class='tl-connect tl-connect-v'></span></span><span class='tl-connect-wrap tl-connect-empty'><span class='tl-connect tl-connect-h'></span><span class='tl-connect tl-connect-v'></span></span><span class='tl-connect-wrap tl-connect-empty'><span class='tl-connect tl-connect-h'></span><span class='tl-connect tl-connect-v'></span></span><span class='tl-connect-wrap tl-connect-x-adjust'> <span class='tl-connect tl-connect-h tl-connect-right'></span><span class='tl-connect tl-connect-v tl-connect-down tl-connect-up'></span></span><span class='tl-connect-wrap'> <span class='tl-connect tl-connect-h tl-connect-left tl-connect-right'></span><span class='tl-connect tl-connect-v'></span></span><span class='tl-connect-wrap tl-connect-empty'><span class='tl-connect tl-connect-h'></span><span class='tl-connect tl-connect-v'></span></span></span><span class="token tl-files-folder tl-files-name" style="color: #032f62;">collections/</span><span class="token">
</span></div><div class='line'><span style="color: #1b1f234d; text-align: right; -webkit-user-select: none; user-select: none;" class="line-number">  </span><span class="token" style="color: #6a737d;"><span class='tl-connect-wrap tl-connect-x-adjust'> <span class='tl-connect tl-connect-h'></span><span class='tl-connect tl-connect-v'></span></span><span class='tl-connect-wrap tl-connect-empty'><span class='tl-connect tl-connect-h'></span><span class='tl-connect tl-connect-v'></span></span><span class='tl-connect-wrap tl-connect-empty'><span class='tl-connect tl-connect-h'></span><span class='tl-connect tl-connect-v'></span></span><span class='tl-connect-wrap tl-connect-x-adjust'> <span class='tl-connect tl-connect-h'></span><span class='tl-connect tl-connect-v tl-connect-down tl-connect-up'></span></span><span class='tl-connect-wrap tl-connect-empty'><span class='tl-connect tl-connect-h'></span><span class='tl-connect tl-connect-v'></span></span><span class='tl-connect-wrap tl-connect-empty'><span class='tl-connect tl-connect-h'></span><span class='tl-connect tl-connect-v'></span></span><span class='tl-connect-wrap tl-connect-x-adjust'> <span class='tl-connect tl-connect-h tl-connect-right'></span><span class='tl-connect tl-connect-v tl-connect-up'></span></span><span class='tl-connect-wrap'> <span class='tl-connect tl-connect-h tl-connect-left tl-connect-right'></span><span class='tl-connect tl-connect-v'></span></span><span class='tl-connect-wrap tl-connect-empty'><span class='tl-connect tl-connect-h'></span><span class='tl-connect tl-connect-v'></span></span></span><span class="token tl-files-folder tl-files-name" style="color: #032f62;">blog/</span><span class="token">
</span></div><div style="background: #d73a4922"class='line line-remove line-has-background'><span style="color: #b31d28;text-align: right; -webkit-user-select: none; user-select: none;" </span></div><div style="background: #34d05822"class='line line-add line-has-background'><span style="color: #22863a;text-align: right; -webkit-user-select: none; user-select: none;" </span></div><div class='line'><span style="color: #1b1f234d; text-align: right; -webkit-user-select: none; user-select: none;" class="line-number">  </span><span class="token" style="color: </span></div><div class='line'><span style="color: #1b1f234d; text-align: right; -webkit-user-select: none; user-select: none;" class="line-number"> </span><span class="token" style="color: #6a737d;"><span class='tl-connect-wrap tl-connect-x-adjust'> <span class='tl-connect tl-connect-h'></span><span class='tl-connect tl-connect-v'></span></span><span class='tl-connect-wrap tl-connect-empty'><span class='tl-connect tl-connect-h'></span><span class='tl-connect tl-connect-v'></span></span><span class='tl-connect-wrap tl-connect-empty'><span class='tl-connect tl-connect-h'></span><span class='tl-connect tl-connect-v'></span></span><span class='tl-connect-wrap tl-connect-x-adjust'> <span class='tl-connect tl-connect-h tl-connect-right'></span><span class='tl-connect tl-connect-v tl-connect-up'></span></span><span class='tl-connect-wrap'> <span class='tl-connect tl-connect-h tl-connect-left tl-connect-right'></span><span class='tl-connect tl-connect-v'></span></span><span class='tl-connect-wrap tl-connect-empty'><span class='tl-connect tl-connect-h'></span><span class='tl-connect tl-connect-v'></span></span></span><span class="token tl-files-file tl-files-name" style="color: #032f62;" tl-file-extension='yaml'>user.yaml</span><span class="token">
</span></div></code></pre>
